column4: hey, quick question, when i try to run WINE with a game i get a message sayin "No JVM could be found on your system. Please define EXE4J_JAVA_HOME to point to an installed 32-bit JDK or JRE." What do i do?
i did but to no prevail
went to their website and got the linux self extracting file
you need it for wine/windows ... not for linux
